Quote.Author: Aldous Huxley
Quote.QuoteValue: After silence, that which comes nearest to expressing the inexpressible is music

Quote.Author: Aldous Huxley
Quote.QuoteValue: You shall know the truth, and the truth shall make you mad

Quote.Author: Aldous Huxley
Quote.QuoteValue: Beauty is worse than wine, it intoxicates both the holder and beholder

Quote.Author: Aldous Huxley
Quote.QuoteValue: Technological progress has merely provided us with more efficient means for going backwards

Quote.Author: Aldous Huxley
Quote.QuoteValue: Experience teaches only the teachable

Quote.Author: Alexander Hamilton
Quote.QuoteValue: A promise must never be broken

Quote.Author: Alexander Hamilton
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the first duty of society is justice

Quote.Author: Alexander Hamilton
Quote.QuoteValue: A well adjusted person is one who makes the same mistake twice without getting nervous

Quote.Author: Alexander Hamilton
Quote.QuoteValue: I never expect to see a perfect work from an imperfect man

Quote.Author: Alexander Hamilton
Quote.QuoteValue: Real firmness is good for anything; strut is good for nothing

Quote.Author: Alexander Hamilton
Quote.QuoteValue: Even to observe neutrality you must have a strong government

Quote.Author: Alexander Hamilton
Quote.QuoteValue: The nation which can prefer disgrace to danger is prepared for a master and deserves one

Quote.Author: Alexander Hamilton
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not tyranny we desire; it's a just, limited, federal government

Quote.Author: Alexander Hamilton
Quote.QuoteValue: The honor of a nation is its life

Quote.Author: Alexander Hamilton
Quote.QuoteValue: Learn to think continentally

Quote.Author: Anais Nin
Quote.QuoteValue: We travel, some of us forever, to seek other states, other lives, other souls

Quote.Author: Anais Nin
Quote.QuoteValue: We don't see things as they are, we see them as we are

Quote.Author: Anais Nin
Quote.QuoteValue: What I cannot love, I overlook. Is that real friendship?

Quote.Author: Anais Nin
Quote.QuoteValue: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage

Quote.Author: Anais Nin
Quote.QuoteValue: There are many ways to be free. One of them is to transcend reality by imagination, as I try to do

Quote.Author: Anais Nin
Quote.QuoteValue: Age does not protect you from love. But love, to some extent, protects you from age

Quote.Author: Anais Nin
Quote.QuoteValue: We write to taste life twice: in the moment and in retrospection

Quote.Author: Anais Nin
Quote.QuoteValue: The personal life deeply lived always expands into truths beyond itself

Quote.Author: Anais Nin
Quote.QuoteValue: I postpone death by living, by suffering, by error, by risking, by giving, by losing

Quote.Author: Anais Nin
Quote.QuoteValue: Do not seek the because - in love there is no because, no reason, no explanation, no solutions

Quote.Author: Andy Warhol
Quote.QuoteValue: Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art

Quote.Author: Andy Warhol
Quote.QuoteValue: They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself

Quote.Author: Andy Warhol
Quote.QuoteValue: Isn't life a series of images that change as they repeat themselves?

Quote.Author: Andy Warhol
Quote.QuoteValue: Art is what you can get away with

Quote.Author: Andy Warhol
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone needs a fantasy

Quote.Author: Andy Warhol
Quote.QuoteValue: Being born is like being kidnapped. And then sold into slavery

Quote.Author: Andy Warhol
Quote.QuoteValue: In the future, everyone will be famous for 15 minutes

Quote.Author: Andy Warhol
Quote.QuoteValue: Sex is more exciting on the screen and between the pages than between the sheets

Quote.Author: Andy Warhol
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're not trying to be real, you don't have to get it right. That's art

Quote.Author: Andy Warhol
Quote.QuoteValue: An artist is somebody who produces things that people don't need to have

Quote.Author: Aristotle
Quote.QuoteValue: Quality is not an act, it is a habit

Quote.Author: Aristotle
Quote.QuoteValue: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light

Quote.Author: Aristotle
Quote.QuoteValue: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet

Quote.Author: Aristotle
Quote.QuoteValue: Pleasure in the job puts perfection in the work

Quote.Author: Aristotle
Quote.QuoteValue: It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it

Quote.Author: Aristotle
Quote.QuoteValue: My best friend is the man who in wishing me well wishes it for my sake

Quote.Author: Aristotle
Quote.QuoteValue: In all things of nature there is something of the marvelous

Quote.Author: Aristotle
Quote.QuoteValue: At his best, man is the noblest of all animals; separated from law and justice he is the worst

Quote.Author: Aristotle
Quote.QuoteValue: The one exclusive sign of thorough knowledge is the power of teaching

Quote.Author: Aristotle
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no great genius without some touch of madness

Quote.Author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
Quote.QuoteValue: Just remember, you can't climb the ladder of success with your hands in your pockets

Quote.Author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
Quote.QuoteValue: Milk is for babies. When you grow up you have to drink beer

Quote.Author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
Quote.QuoteValue: My body is like breakfast, lunch, and dinner. I don't think about it, I just have it

Quote.Author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
Quote.QuoteValue: It's simple, if it jiggles, it's fat

Quote.Author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
Quote.QuoteValue: The future is green energy, sustainability, renewable energy

Quote.Author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
Quote.QuoteValue: Start wide, expand further, and never look back

Quote.Author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
Quote.QuoteValue: I saw a woman wearing a sweatshirt with Guess on it. I said, Thyroid problem?

Quote.Author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
Quote.QuoteValue: Failure is not an option. Everyone has to succeed

Quote.Author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
Quote.QuoteValue: The worst thing I can be is the same as everybody else. I hate that

Quote.Author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that gay marriage should be between a man and a woman

Quote.Author: Arthur Schopenhauer
Quote.QuoteValue: Talent hits a target no one else can hit; Genius hits a target no one else can see

Quote.Author: Arthur Schopenhauer
Quote.QuoteValue: Just remember, once you're over the hill you begin to pick up speed

Quote.Author: Arthur Schopenhauer
Quote.QuoteValue: Great men are like eagles, and build their nest on some lofty solitude

Quote.Author: Arthur Schopenhauer
Quote.QuoteValue: Men are by nature merely indifferent to one another; but women are by nature enemies

Quote.Author: Arthur Schopenhauer
Quote.QuoteValue: Wealth is like sea-water; the more we drink, the thirstier we become; and the same is true of fame

Quote.Author: Arthur Schopenhauer
Quote.QuoteValue: It's the niceties that make the difference fate gives us the hand, and we play the cards

Quote.Author: Arthur Schopenhauer
Quote.QuoteValue: Satisfaction consists in freedom from pain, which is the positive element of life

Quote.Author: Arthur Schopenhauer
Quote.QuoteValue: The two enemies of human happiness are pain and boredom

Quote.Author: Arthur Schopenhauer
Quote.QuoteValue: Politeness is to human nature what warmth is to wax

Quote.Author: Arthur Schopenhauer
Quote.QuoteValue: Treat a work of art like a prince. Let it speak to you first

Quote.Author: Audrey Hepburn
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!

Quote.Author: Audrey Hepburn
Quote.QuoteValue: The most important thing is to enjoy your life - to be happy - it's all that matters

Quote.Author: Audrey Hepburn
Quote.QuoteValue: Water is life, and clean water means health

Quote.Author: Audrey Hepburn
Quote.QuoteValue: Let's face it, a nice creamy chocolate cake does a lot for a lot of people; it does for me

Quote.Author: Audrey Hepburn
Quote.QuoteValue: Success is like reaching an important birthday and finding you're exactly the same

Quote.Author: Audrey Hepburn
Quote.QuoteValue: I was born with an enormous need for affection, and a terrible need to give it

Quote.Author: Audrey Hepburn
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything I learned I learned from the movies

Quote.Author: Audrey Hepburn
Quote.QuoteValue: If I get married, I want to be very married

Quote.Author: Audrey Hepburn
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to be alone, I want to be left alone

Quote.Author: Audrey Hepburn
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't believe in collective guilt, but I do believe in collective responsibility

Quote.Author: Ayn Rand
Quote.QuoteValue: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others

Quote.Author: Ayn Rand
Quote.QuoteValue: The ladder of success is best climbed by stepping on the rungs of opportunity

Quote.Author: Ayn Rand
Quote.QuoteValue: The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me

Quote.Author: Ayn Rand
Quote.QuoteValue: To achieve, you need thought. You have to know what you are doing and that's real power

Quote.Author: Ayn Rand
Quote.QuoteValue: The man who lets a leader prescribe his course is a wreck being towed to the scrap heap

Quote.Author: Ayn Rand
Quote.QuoteValue: The truth is not for all men, but only for those who seek it

Quote.Author: Ayn Rand
Quote.QuoteValue: The hardest thing to explain is the glaringly evident which everybody had decided not to see

Quote.Author: Ayn Rand
Quote.QuoteValue: Individual rights are the means of subordinating society to moral law

Quote.Author: Ayn Rand
Quote.QuoteValue: To say 'I love you' one must first be able to say the 'I.'

Quote.Author: Ayn Rand
Quote.QuoteValue: If any civilization is to survive, it is the morality of altruism that men have to reject

Quote.Author: Barack Obama
Quote.QuoteValue: Money is not the only answer, but it makes a difference

Quote.Author: Barack Obama
Quote.QuoteValue: That's the good thing about being president, I can do whatever I want

Quote.Author: Barack Obama
Quote.QuoteValue: There's not a liberal America and a conservative America - there's the United States of America

Quote.Author: Barack Obama
Quote.QuoteValue: My fellow Americans, we are and always will be a nation of immigrants. We were strangers once, too

Quote.Author: Barack Obama
Quote.QuoteValue: I just miss - I miss being anonymous

Quote.Author: Barack Obama
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't oppose all wars. What I am opposed to is a dumb war. What I am opposed to is a rash war

Quote.Author: Barack Obama
Quote.QuoteValue: Why can't I just eat my waffle?

Quote.Author: Barack Obama
Quote.QuoteValue: People of Berlin - people of the world - this is our moment. This is our time

Quote.Author: Barack Obama
Quote.QuoteValue: What Washington needs is adult supervision

Quote.Author: Barack Obama
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a warrior for the middle class

Quote.Author: Ben Shapiro
Quote.QuoteValue: Distrust of government isn't baseless cynicism. It's realism

Quote.Author: Ben Shapiro
Quote.QuoteValue: Matt Damon's anti-fracking diatribe was funded by the royal family of the United Arab Emirates

Quote.Author: Ben Shapiro
Quote.QuoteValue: Kids are fat because of lack of parenting

Quote.Author: Ben Shapiro
Quote.QuoteValue: Musicians are, by and large, not the most politically savvy crew

Quote.Author: Ben Shapiro
Quote.QuoteValue: Google has long been a leftist company

Quote.Author: Ben Shapiro
Quote.QuoteValue: Bad presidents don't deserve holidays. They deserve scorn

Quote.Author: Ben Shapiro
Quote.QuoteValue: When a black person kills a black person, the media ignores it completely

Quote.Author: Ben Shapiro
Quote.QuoteValue: Only reprobates father children and then abandon them

Quote.Author: Ben Shapiro
Quote.QuoteValue: It took capitalism half a century to come back from the Great Depression

Quote.Author: Ben Shapiro
Quote.QuoteValue: Vaccinations absolutely work, and have dramatically decreased rates of childhood diseases

Quote.Author: Bertrand Russell
Quote.QuoteValue: The good life is one inspired by love and guided by knowledge

Quote.Author: Bertrand Russell
Quote.QuoteValue: The trouble with the world is that the stupid are cocksure and the intelligent are full of doubt

Quote.Author: Bertrand Russell
Quote.QuoteValue: War does not determine who is right - only who is left

Quote.Author: Bertrand Russell
Quote.QuoteValue: The world is full of magical things patiently waiting for our wits to grow sharper

Quote.Author: Bertrand Russell
Quote.QuoteValue: The only thing that will redeem mankind is cooperation

Quote.Author: Bertrand Russell
Quote.QuoteValue: I would never die for my beliefs because I might be wrong

Quote.Author: Bertrand Russell
Quote.QuoteValue: Men are born ignorant, not stupid. They are made stupid by education

Quote.Author: Bertrand Russell
Quote.QuoteValue: To be without some of the things you want is an indispensable part of happiness

Quote.Author: Bertrand Russell
Quote.QuoteValue: To conquer fear is the beginning of wisdom

Quote.Author: Bertrand Russell
Quote.QuoteValue: Extreme hopes are born from extreme misery

Quote.Author: Beyonce Knowles
Quote.QuoteValue: If everything was perfect, you would never learn and you would never grow

Quote.Author: Beyonce Knowles
Quote.QuoteValue: Power means happiness; power means hard work and sacrifice

Quote.Author: Beyonce Knowles
Quote.QuoteValue: Whenever I'm confused about something, I ask God to reveal the answers to my questions, and he does

Quote.Author: Beyonce Knowles
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a human being and I fall in love and sometimes I don't have control of every situation

Quote.Author: Beyonce Knowles
Quote.QuoteValue: Y'all are so cute and y'all talk so proper over here. I love England

Quote.Author: Beyonce Knowles
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to walk around with bare feet and I don't like to comb my hair

Quote.Author: Beyonce Knowles
Quote.QuoteValue: The more successful I become, the more I need a man

Quote.Author: Beyonce Knowles
Quote.QuoteValue: If he invited you out, he's got to pay

Quote.Author: Beyonce Knowles
Quote.QuoteValue: I just hope people don't get sick of us. I'm sick of us and I'm in Destiny's Child

Quote.Author: Beyonce Knowles
Quote.QuoteValue: I get nervous when I don't get nervous. If I'm nervous I know I'm going to have a good show

Quote.Author: Bhumibol Adulyadej
Quote.QuoteValue: Nature is something outside our body, but the mind is within us

Quote.Author: Bhumibol Adulyadej
Quote.QuoteValue: The will to work of everyone in the country is the best guarantee of national survival

Quote.Author: Bhumibol Adulyadej
Quote.QuoteValue: It is a duty of everyone to cooperate and help each other

Quote.Author: Bhumibol Adulyadej
Quote.QuoteValue: I have been extremely touched by these signs of affection on the part of all the Thai people

Quote.Author: Bhumibol Adulyadej
Quote.QuoteValue: I know things, but I shut my mouth. They don't want me to speak, so I don't speak

Quote.Author: Bhumibol Adulyadej
Quote.QuoteValue: If they want to write about me in a good way, they should write how I do things that are useful

Quote.Author: Bhumibol Adulyadej
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody needs to lower his ego

Quote.Author: Bhumibol Adulyadej
Quote.QuoteValue: It is useless to live on burned ruins

Quote.Author: Bhumibol Adulyadej
Quote.QuoteValue: Without unity, the country will face disaster

Quote.Author: Bhumibol Adulyadej
Quote.QuoteValue: The most important thing is you should not be split or fighting each other

Quote.Author: Bill Cosby
Quote.QuoteValue: Every closed eye is not sleeping, and every open eye is not seeing

Quote.Author: Bill Cosby
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know the key to success, but the key to failure is trying to please everybody

Quote.Author: Bill Cosby
Quote.QuoteValue: A word to the wise ain't necessary - it's the stupid ones that need the advice

Quote.Author: Bill Cosby
Quote.QuoteValue: The past is a ghost, the future a dream, and all we ever have is now

Quote.Author: Bill Cosby
Quote.QuoteValue: That married couples can live together day after day is a miracle that the Vatican has overlooked

Quote.Author: Bill Cosby
Quote.QuoteValue: In order to succeed, your desire for success should be greater than your fear of failure

Quote.Author: Bill Cosby
Quote.QuoteValue: Gray hair is God's graffiti

Quote.Author: Bill Cosby
Quote.QuoteValue: Human beings are the only creatures on earth that allow their children to come back home

Quote.Author: Bill Cosby
Quote.QuoteValue: Decide that you want it more than you are afraid of it

Quote.Author: Bill Cosby
Quote.QuoteValue: There are some people who have trouble recognizing a mess

Quote.Author: Bill Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can't lose

Quote.Author: Bill Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: It's fine to celebrate success but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure

Quote.Author: Bill Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: The Internet is becoming the town square for the global village of tomorrow

Quote.Author: Bill Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: We all need people who will give us feedback. That's how we improve

Quote.Author: Bill Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: Discrimination has a lot of layers that make it tough for minorities to get a leg up

Quote.Author: Bill Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning

Quote.Author: Bill Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: Software is a great combination between artistry and engineering

Quote.Author: Bill Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: As we look ahead into the next century, leaders will be those who empower others

Quote.Author: Bill Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: Treatment without prevention is simply unsustainable

Quote.Author: Bill Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: If you can't make it good, at least make it look good

Quote.Author: Billy Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: A child who is allowed to be disrespectful to his parents will not have true respect for anyone

Quote.Author: Billy Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing can bring a real sense of security into the home except true love

Quote.Author: Billy Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: God has given us two hands, one to receive with and the other to give with

Quote.Author: Billy Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: Once you've lost your privacy, you realize you've lost an extremely valuable thing

Quote.Author: Billy Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: Tears shed for self are tears of weakness, but tears shed for others are a sign of strength

Quote.Author: Billy Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: Auschwitz stands as a tragic reminder of the terrible potential man has for violence and inhumanity

Quote.Author: Billy Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: A real Christian is a person who can give his pet parrot to the town gossip

Quote.Author: Billy Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: Every day is a gift from God, no matter how old we are

Quote.Author: Billy Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: Only those who want everything done for them are bored

Quote.Author: Billy Graham
Quote.QuoteValue: The most eloquent prayer is the prayer through hands that heal and bless

Quote.Author: Bob Dylan
Quote.QuoteValue: Take care of all your memories. For you cannot relive them

Quote.Author: Bob Dylan
Quote.QuoteValue: No one is free, even the birds are chained to the sky

Quote.Author: Bob Dylan
Quote.QuoteValue: A hero is someone who understands the responsibility that comes with his freedom

Quote.Author: Bob Dylan
Quote.QuoteValue: Yesterday's just a memory, tomorrow is never what it's supposed to be

Quote.Author: Bob Dylan
Quote.QuoteValue: A mistake is to commit a misunderstanding

Quote.Author: Bob Dylan
Quote.QuoteValue: All I can do is be me, whoever that is

Quote.Author: Bob Dylan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll let you be in my dreams if I can be in yours

Quote.Author: Bob Dylan
Quote.QuoteValue: At times in my life the only place I have been happy is when I am on stage

Quote.Author: Bob Dylan
Quote.QuoteValue: Inspiration is hard to come by. You have to take it where you find it

Quote.Author: Bob Dylan
Quote.QuoteValue: I can be jubilant one moment and pensive the next, and a cloud could go by and make that happen

Quote.Author: Bob Marley
Quote.QuoteValue: One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain

Quote.Author: Bob Marley
Quote.QuoteValue: Truth is everybody is going to hurt you: you just gotta find the ones worth suffering for

Quote.Author: Bob Marley
Quote.QuoteValue: The good times of today, are the sad thoughts of tomorrow

Quote.Author: Bob Marley
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't gain the world and lose your soul; wisdom is better than silver or gold

Quote.Author: Bob Marley
Quote.QuoteValue: Open your eyes, look within. Are you satisfied with the life you're living?

Quote.Author: Bob Marley
Quote.QuoteValue: In this bright future you can't forget your past

Quote.Author: Bob Marley
Quote.QuoteValue: None but ourselves can free our minds

Quote.Author: Bob Marley
Quote.QuoteValue: When you smoke the herb, it reveals you to yourself

Quote.Author: Bob Marley
Quote.QuoteValue: Get up, stand up, Stand up for your rights. Get up, stand up, Don't give up the fight

Quote.Author: Bob Marley
Quote.QuoteValue: When one door is closed, don't you know, another is open

Quote.Author: Brene Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no innovation and creativity without failure. Period

Quote.Author: Brene Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: You're imperfect, and you're wired for struggle, but you are worthy of love and belonging

Quote.Author: Brene Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: Vulnerability is not weakness. And that myth is profoundly dangerous

Quote.Author: Brene Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: Maybe stories are just data with a soul

Quote.Author: Brene Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: When the people we love stop paying attention, trust begins to slip away and hurt starts seeping in

Quote.Author: Brene Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, the opposite of scarcity is not abundance. It's enough. I'm enough. My kids are enough

Quote.Author: Brene Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: Vulnerability is basically uncertainty, risk, and emotional exposure

Quote.Author: Brene Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm like a recovering perfectionist. For me it's one day at a time

Quote.Author: Brene Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: Shame is the most powerful, master emotion. It's the fear that we're not good enough

Quote.Author: Brene Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: The uncertainty of parenting can bring up feelings in us that range from frustration to terror

Quote.Author: Calvin Coolidge
Quote.QuoteValue: No person was ever honored for what he received. Honor has been the reward for what he gave

Quote.Author: Calvin Coolidge
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't expect to build up the weak by pulling down the strong

Quote.Author: Calvin Coolidge
Quote.QuoteValue: It takes a great man to be a good listener

Quote.Author: Calvin Coolidge
Quote.QuoteValue: Those who trust to chance must abide by the results of chance

Quote.Author: Calvin Coolidge
Quote.QuoteValue: I have noticed that nothing I never said ever did me any harm

Quote.Author: Calvin Coolidge
Quote.QuoteValue: Civilization and profit go hand in hand

Quote.Author: Calvin Coolidge
Quote.QuoteValue: Heroism is not only in the man, but in the occasion

Quote.Author: Calvin Coolidge
Quote.QuoteValue: The slogan 'press on' has solved and always will solve the problems of the human race

Quote.Author: Calvin Coolidge
Quote.QuoteValue: When more and more people are thrown out of work, unemployment results

Quote.Author: Calvin Coolidge
Quote.QuoteValue: We cannot do everything at once, but we can do something at once

Quote.Author: Carl Jung
Quote.QuoteValue: The word 'happy' would lose its meaning if it were not balanced by sadness

Quote.Author: Carl Jung
Quote.QuoteValue: Knowing your own darkness is the best method for dealing with the darknesses of other people

Quote.Author: Carl Jung
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything that irritates us about others can lead us to an understanding of ourselves

Quote.Author: Carl Jung
Quote.QuoteValue: Children are educated by what the grown-up is and not by his talk

Quote.Author: Carl Jung
Quote.QuoteValue: Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes

Quote.Author: Carl Jung
Quote.QuoteValue: In all chaos there is a cosmos, in all disorder a secret order

Quote.Author: Carl Jung
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no birth of consciousness without pain

Quote.Author: Carl Jung
Quote.QuoteValue: The least of things with a meaning is worth more in life than the greatest of things without it

Quote.Author: Carl Jung
Quote.QuoteValue: When an inner situation is not made conscious, it appears outside as fate

Quote.Author: Carl Jung
Quote.QuoteValue: It all depends on how we look at things, and not how they are in themselves

Quote.Author: Carol Burnett
Quote.QuoteValue: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me

Quote.Author: Carol Burnett
Quote.QuoteValue: We don't stop going to school when we graduate

Quote.Author: Carol Burnett
Quote.QuoteValue: When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go

Quote.Author: Carol Burnett
Quote.QuoteValue: Words, once they are printed, have a life of their own

Quote.Author: Carol Burnett
Quote.QuoteValue: Because nobody goes through life without a scar

Quote.Author: Carol Burnett
Quote.QuoteValue: Adolescence is just one big walking pimple

Quote.Author: Carol Burnett
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the hardest thing to do in the world, show-business-wise, is write comedy

Quote.Author: Carol Burnett
Quote.QuoteValue: Celebrity was a long time in coming; it will go away. Everything goes away

Quote.Author: Carol Burnett
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have false teeth. Do you think I'd buy teeth like these?

Quote.Author: Carol Burnett
Quote.QuoteValue: Comedy is tragedy - plus time

Quote.Author: Charles R. Swindoll
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it

Quote.Author: Charles R. Swindoll
Quote.QuoteValue: Each day of our lives we make deposits in the memory banks of our children

Quote.Author: Charles R. Swindoll
Quote.QuoteValue: The difference between something good and something great is attention to detail

Quote.Author: Charles R. Swindoll
Quote.QuoteValue: A teardrop on earth summons the King of heaven

Quote.Author: Charles R. Swindoll
Quote.QuoteValue: When you have vision it affects your attitude. Your attitude is optimistic rather than pessimistic

Quote.Author: Charles R. Swindoll
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a preacher. I'm involved in many other things, but, mainly, I preach. And I love it!

Quote.Author: Charles R. Swindoll
Quote.QuoteValue: Prejudice is a learned trait. You're not born prejudiced; you're taught it

Quote.Author: Charles R. Swindoll
Quote.QuoteValue: We need discernment in what we see and what we hear and what we believe

Quote.Author: Charles R. Swindoll
Quote.QuoteValue: Alleged 'impossibilities' are opportunities for our capacities to be stretched

Quote.Author: Charles R. Swindoll
Quote.QuoteValue: When I think of vision, I have in mind the ability to see above and beyond the majority

Quote.Author: Charles Spurgeon
Quote.QuoteValue: A lie can travel half way around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes

Quote.Author: Charles Spurgeon
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not how much we have, but how much we enjoy, that makes happiness

Quote.Author: Charles Spurgeon
Quote.QuoteValue: Sincerity makes the very least person to be of more value than the most talented hypocrite

Quote.Author: Charles Spurgeon
Quote.QuoteValue: Anxiety does not empty tomorrow of its sorrows, but only empties today of its strength

Quote.Author: Charles Spurgeon
Quote.QuoteValue: By perseverance the snail reached the ark

Quote.Author: Charles Spurgeon
Quote.QuoteValue: Beware of no man more than of yourself; we carry our worst enemies within us

Quote.Author: Charles Spurgeon
Quote.QuoteValue: The Lord gets his best soldiers out of the highlands of affliction

Quote.Author: Charles Spurgeon
Quote.QuoteValue: Trials teach us what we are; they dig up the soil, and let us see what we are made of

Quote.Author: Charles Spurgeon
Quote.QuoteValue: Free will carried many a soul to hell, but never a soul to heaven

Quote.Author: Charles Spurgeon
Quote.QuoteValue: No one is so miserable as the poor person who maintains the appearance of wealth

Quote.Author: Chester Bennington
Quote.QuoteValue: You're constantly trying to prove yourself, even after you've made it

Quote.Author: Chester Bennington
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like to hold back, because that's how you hurt yourself

Quote.Author: Chester Bennington
Quote.QuoteValue: As an artist, I want a reaction

Quote.Author: Chester Bennington
Quote.QuoteValue: My favorite jellybean is the pink one with the flavor inside

Quote.Author: Chester Bennington
Quote.QuoteValue: The fans are the biggest reason we do what we do
